homeP1: We want to bring a new football gaming experience to fans around the world with unprecedented authenticity.
homeP2: This has always been our purpose, so we continue to work hard to collect feedback from real players and continue to improve and introduce new features based on feedback so that more fans can have fun in the game.
homeP3: eFootball™ will move from 2022 to 2023 as the real world enters a new season.
homeP4: Whether it is an outstanding player in the opening game or a new look of major clubs, we will continue to bring you more rich content, so that you can still enjoy the passion and happiness brought by football in the new season!
homeP5: Come to eFootball™ 2023 to experience the heart and soul of 'real football'!
homeTltle2: How to fully enjoy the eFootball™
homeTltle2text: eFootball™ World is at the heart of the eFootball™ experience. Here you can play with the best teams in the game and build your dream team by signing and developing your favorite players. When you're ready, go to the biggest stage and the most exciting events to compete with opponents from all over the world.
homeTltle3text1: “eFootball™ International Cup” is a country-by-country competition,
homeTltle3text2: All players fight for national glory. Sign up in-game to get rewards!
homeTltle3text3: In addition, all players will have a total of 1 billion eFootball™ coins to share, and the number of coins players can earn will be determined by their country's ranking in each category.
homeTltle3text4: Represent your own country and do your part by scoring goals or winning!
